Detailed Description

The class represents a single connection thread

void org::ipdr::api::ConnectionThread::loadStateMachine (   )  [inline, protected]
 

Loads state machine according to connection initiator 

00185     {
00186         IPDRStateMachine ipdrStateMachine;
00187         if (isActiveConnection)
00188         {
00189                 ipdrStateMachine =new IPDRStateMachine(this.connection, config,
00190                                 outputter, templateNegotiator,
00191                                         stateMachineListener, connectionController);
00192         }
00193         else
00194         {
00195                 ipdrStateMachine =new IPDRStateMachine(this.connection,
00196                                 outputterFactory, negotiatorFactory,
00197                                         stateMachineListener, connectionController,
00198                                         connectionHandler, this);
00199         }
00200         if (this.probingListener!=null)
00201                 ipdrStateMachine.setProbingListener(this.probingListener);
00202         stateMachine = ipdrStateMachine; 
00203     }

void org::ipdr::api::ConnectionThread::run (   )  [inline]
 

See also:
java.lang.Runnable#run() 
00209     {
00210         
00211         boolean reloadStateMachine = false;
00212      
00213         loadStateMachine();
00214                 
00215         try
00216         {
00217             int attempt = 0;
00218             boolean success = false;
00219             if (isActiveConnection)
00220             while ( keepConnecting && (attempt < config.getRetryCount() || config.getRetryCount() == ConnectionConfigI.INFINITE) )
00221             {
00222                 try
00223                 {
00224                     if (reloadStateMachine)
00225                     {
00226                         this.stateMachine.cleanup();
00227                         loadStateMachine();
00228                         reloadStateMachine = false;
00229                     }
00230                     
00231                     while (connectionController!= null && !connectionController.canConnect(config.getExporterAddress(), config))
00232                         sleep(config.getCollectorConfig().getControllerQueryInterval());
00233                     
00234                         connectToExporter();
00235                         if (!keepConnecting)
00236                             throw new ConnectionIOException("Failed to connect to the exporter after " + attempt + " tries. Giving up on disconnection request", config, null); 
00237                         stateMachine.setConnection(this.connection);
00238                         reloadStateMachine = true;
00239                         stateMachine.mainLoop();
00240                         success = true;
00241                 }
00242                 catch (ConnectionIOException e)
00243                 {
00244                     if (this.stateMachineListener != null)
00245                         this.stateMachineListener.notifyDisconnected(config.getExporterAddress(), config.getExporterPort());
00246                     LogManager.warn(this,"connectToExporter","Connection to " + config.getExporterAndPortString() + " failed, attempt " + (attempt+1) + ". Sleeping for " + config.getRetryInterval() + " seconds" );
00247                     attempt++;
00248                     success = false;
00249                     sleep(config.getRetryInterval()*1000);
00250                     continue;
00251                 }
00252                 if (!success)
00253                     throw new ConnectionIOException("Failed to connect to the exporter after " + attempt + " tries. Giving up", config, null); 
00254             }
00255             if (!isActiveConnection)
00256             {
00257                 ((IPDRStateMachine) stateMachine).startListeningState();
00258                 stateMachine.mainLoop();
00259             }
00260 
00261         }
00262         catch (ConnectionIOException e)
00263         {
00264             LogManager.error(this, "run", e.getMessage());
00265         }
00266         catch (InterruptedException e)
00267         {
00268             LogManager.error(this, "run", e.getMessage());
00269         }
00270         catch (ConfigException e)
00271         {
00272             LogManager.error(this, "run", e.getMessage());
00273         }
00274         finally
00275         {
00276             if (stateMachine != null)
00277                 stateMachine.cleanup();
00278             if (config != null)
00279                 config.removeReference();
00280         }
00281     }
